author: kfogel
msg: * ac-helpers/neon.m4 (SVN_NEON_CONFIG): Replaces SVN_SEARCH_NEON, more
descriptive name.

author: cmpilato
msg: Call test programs using the appropriate interpreter as dictated by
the file extensions.
Patch by: Mo DeJong <supermo@bayarea.net>
(Tweaked by me.)
* Makefile.in
(check): Run scripts using either python or sh and exec programs
that are executable.  Change grep pattern to "\\.sh$$" so that it
gets passed to grep as "\.sh$". Move printing of warning when tests
fails to end of test run.

author: cmpilato
msg: More $!@#$! "fixes" for the !#@$!@ status I broke...
* subversion/include/svn_wc.h
(svn_wc_status_kind): Added svn_wc_status_unversioned.
(svn_wc_status): Added some g00dies to the docstring.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/status.c
(assemble_status): Move the svn_io_check_path call up a bit.  Use
svn_wc_status_unversioned for things on disk with no entries, and
svn_wc_status_none for unversioned things that are also not present
on disk.
* subversion/clients/cmdline/status.c
(generate_status_codes): Pay attention to unversioned items.
(print_long_format, print_short_format): Use a consistent call to
generate_status_codes.  By golly, it's the caller's fault if the
status structure isn't built right.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/status_editor.c
(tweak_statushash): Always use the public API when there is not
status structure in the hash already.

author: kfogel
msg: * ac-helpers/neon.m4 (SVN_SEARCH_NEON): New function that determines
the proper compilation and link flags from neon-config.
(SVN_LIB_NEON): Remove the normal detection of neon-config's info to
SVN_SEARCH_NEON.  Call SVN_SEARCH_NEON when --with-neon is specified
or when no source dir is found.  Factor out the /usr/include removal
of SVN_NEON_INCLUDES to always happen, not just in the non --with-neon
case.  Fix AC_MSG_RESULT call to output neon's version in the correct
places at the correct time.
Patch by: Justin Erenkrantz <jerenkrantz@ebuilt.com>

author: kfogel
msg: Revert revision 703, as it seems to cause Subversion builds to fail
with this error:
libtool: link: cannot find the library `apr/libapr.la'
